titles.title: Enhancing Resources Utilized in Developing Investments for Tuition Expenditures Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a lump sum contribution to Coverdell education savings accounts whenever the contribution limit is increased.
Enhancing Resources Utilized in Developing Investments for Tuition Expenditures Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Enhancing Resources Utilized in Developing Investments for Tuition Expenditures Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code, concerning Coverdell education savings accounts, to provide for a new contribution limit lump sum contribution.
